sections.heading: Skills
content: HTML, CSS, PHP, Laravel, JavaScript, Node.js, Vue, React, Git, MySQL, Figma, Affinity Designer, Wordpress

content.title: Title
content.description: description - key results and high level summary

responsibilities: Exceeded performance metrics by over 80%, surpassing $1.5 million in remote installed-sales

Proactively identified and implemented process improvements within the centralized selling model, contributing valuable insights and recommendations to enhance the customer experience and streamline operations
Successfully delivered prompt and knowledgeable responses to inquiries, resolved issues efficiently, and ensured the successful completion of projects
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to optimize work processes and maintain effective communication, showcasing strong teamwork and collaboration skills
Provided hands-on technical assistance and business support for cross-functional teams
Assessed processes to uncover bottlenecks and implement solutions for smoother operations
Delivered timely and accurate estimates to drive increase sales and maintain service-level agreement
Provided 1-on-1 mentorship for colleagues, facilitating the dissemination of best practices and product knowledge and fostering a collaborative team environment

content.location: The University of North Carolina at Greensboro
content.subject: B.S. Information Systems
